### Step Variability Plot  {data-height=2500}
```{r}
imageOutput("var")
```

```{r, context="server"}
output$var <- renderSVG({ reactive({
    mu <- get_mu_dyn_long()
    if (!input$doPaired) {
      plot_boxplots(mu, participants, input$plotVar, input$varCategory, baseSize = input$baseSize)
    }
    else {
      plot_paired(mu, input$plotVar, input$varCategory[1], input$varCategory[-1], input$baseSize)
    }
  })
})
```
